Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Adro
Reviews.Content: The phone was new as advertised and sealed in the box.  It arrived within 2 days of my order and activation with Verizon was easy.  Glad to get the phone without having to enter a new contract with Verizon which would have meant losing the unlimited data plan we currently have.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product, great service
Reviews.Author: BP
Reviews.Content: I give them 5 stars because I know products and service. I am a business owner and another job as an account manager dealing with customers. The product I received was flawless. I asked 1 question by email and received an immediate response. I have already recommended it to my partnsrs and will be buying more myself.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Flyersfan
Reviews.Content: After I broke my 4s I was able to sell it Gazelle.com and then was given a good amount so I could purchase this phone. I've had it for about a month now and it works great, much better than my replacement.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Zarah
Reviews.Content: I like my phone soo far I love the look of it and its size.the only thing that is a pain is turning it on after it was off it takes a while.but I love love love it it works well.

Reviews.Title: Excellent condition, no scratches and minimal fingerprints--works perfectly!
Reviews.Author: Delia Gleason
Reviews.Content: Spectacular quality, works perfectly and comes with all the accessories!  I am using this iPhone myself now, with no difficulties.  Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4
Reviews.Author: Tigger11894
Reviews.Content: This phone works great and I have no problems with it. The service is great and I rarely lose service

Reviews.Title: NOT WHAT I EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: JORGE BEST
Reviews.Content: Doesn't have the SimCard Slot at the side of the iPhone so you cant use it but with Verizon previous contract.

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfied
Reviews.Author: Kevin Passmore
Reviews.Content: It is protected by a password that I have no control over. So I cant connect to the internet I cant even use it as a fraking Ipod. It is an expensive paperweight.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Quality
Reviews.Author: ana
Reviews.Content: I choose a five star because the shipping was quick I was excited to receive it. The Iphone was packed securely in bubble-wrap. The screen protector that I got on the phone feels more thick than most phone screen protectors which I enjoy. It had no scratches and was in perfect shape when I got it. It came with everything that was it said I was purchasing. Took five minutes to switch over super EASY and SIMPLE, and it also came with a note that had instructions to set up the Iphone ( SUPER helpful) and said if I had any questions to call a number.I'm completely satisfied with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Swan
Reviews.Content: I never thought I would love my phone as much as I do this iphone. it was the best investment we made. thank you
